value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day - 21: Beyond Report Development - Part 2
value.excerpt: In this video, we demonstrate publishing a report, and then show how to embed it using URL access, and also how to create a subscription. value.title: Power BI Dataflow vs Data Warehouse   Which one to choose
value.excerpt: Dataflow is the data transformation service in Power BI, and also some other Power Platform services. Data Warehouse is the cloud storage and also compute engine for data. value.title: Power BI Theme   Customize Colors Fonts and Visual Appearance for Multiple Objects
value.excerpt: If you build a report for an enterprise, you might be limited to use the organization-approved colors. It is also useful to have your reports following a template of colors, and fonts, which might look like your signature of the report. In Power BI, you can do that with Theme.
